review: I had my doubts that this thing would work, but it did, and I really enjoy using it!  I have an hour break in between my two jobs. I pack meals and snacks, and when my car is parked in the parking lot, I have somethings to eat.  For years I have been frustrated with how awkward it can be to eat in my car without a proper table. I would drop food in my lap!  Now that I have this table it makes that hour break so much more enjoyable. I can set my cell phone on it and check email as I have a bite to eat! It feels like luxury after all this years of roughing it.  This product was well worth my $18!
productTitle: Zone Tech Multi-Functional Portable Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray - Gray Table/Car Vehicle Seat Portable Mount Tray Laptop Notebook Table Eating Desk
